title: DDFP 643: Reggie Wayne on winning Super Bowl XLI & his 2001 NFL Draft story
itunes:title: DDFP 643: Reggie Wayne on winning Super Bowl XLI & his 2001 NFL Draft story
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined by Reggie Wayne to tell his story of draft day in 2001 when the Indianapolis Colts selected him in the first round (40:55). Reggie also recounts the biggest play he made in his career, which was in the first quarter Super Bowl XLI vs the Chicago Bears (31:00). The guys also were kibitzing about the best trios (5:40) between Steelers (Bell, Roethlisberger, Brown) vs Colts (Manning, Wayne, James) and University of Pittsburgh (Marino, Dorsett, Fitzgerald) vs University of Miami (Kelly, Wayne, Gore).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
